title: BRIEF-CIMIC Group Says CPB Contractors Selected For Sunbury Line Upgrade
text:
BRIEF-CIMIC Group Says CPB Contractors Selected For Sunbury Line Upgrade

Stock Markets 46 minutes ago (Oct 02, 2019 10:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-CIMIC Group Says CPB Contractors Selected For Sunbury Line Upgrade Oct 2 (Reuters) - CIMIC Group Ltd : * CIMIC'S CPB CONTRACTORS SELECTED FOR SUNBURY LINE UPGRADE * WORKS WILL PROVIDE UPGRADES TO RAIL NETWORK'S POWER SYSTEM, GENERATING REVENUE OF APPROXIMATELY $158 MILLION TO CPB CONTRACTORS * WORK WILL COMMENCE THIS YEAR AND IS SCHEDULED TO BE COMPLETED IN 2023.

BRIEF-CIMIC Group Says CPB Contractors Selected For Sunbury Line Upgrade
description: BRIEF-CIMIC Group Says CPB Contractors Selected For Sunbury Line Upgrade
